property.name: bigframe.application.domain
property.description: Choose the application domain you want to benchmark on. Currently, supported applications are: BI

property.name: bigframe.datavariety
property.description: BI: only relational, graph, nested data are supported.

property.name: bigframe.datavolume
property.description: tiny: around 10GB small: around 100GB medium: around 1TB large: around 10TB extra large: around 100TB

property.name: bigframe.datavolume.relational.proportion
property.description: It is used to determine the proportion of relational data set in terms of the whole data volume.

property.name: bigframe.datavolume.graph.proportion
property.description: It is used to determine the proportion of graph data set in terms of the whole data volume.

property.name: bigframe.datavolume.nested.proportion
property.description: It is used to determine the proportion of nested data set in terms of the whole data volume.

property.name: bigframe.datavolume.text.proportion
property.description: It is used to determine the proportion of text data set in terms of the whole data volume.

property.name: bigframe.datavelocity.relational
property.description:
It is used to determine the data refresh rate of relational data.
BI: The absolute number represents the number of sales generated per second per city.

property.name: bigframe.datavelocity.graph
property.description:
It is used to determine the data refresh rate of graph data.
BI: Not available

property.name: bigframe.datavelocity.nested
property.description:
It is used to determine the data refresh rate of nested data.
BI: The absolute number represents the number of tweets generated per second per city.

property.name: bigframe.datavelocity.text
property.description:
It is used to determine the data refresh rate of text data.
BI: Not available

property.name: bigframe.data.hdfspath.relational
property.description: The HDFS path to store relational data.

property.name: bigframe.data.hdfspath.graph
property.description: The HDFS path to store graph data.

property.name: bigframe.data.hdfspath.nested
property.description: The HDFS path to store nested data.

property.name: bigframe.data.hdfspath.text
property.description: The HDFS path to store text data.
